name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - S Part 2 | Brain Teasers | 25 Questions

questions.text:
Each question will consist of three or more clues. For instance, the three clues might read "Beverage - Hockey arena - Pen fluid". You must come up with these answers. The first answer is the longest word, the second answer will drop the first letter of the first answer, and the same thing happens to find the third word. In this case, the answers would be "Drink - Rink - Ink". I want you to type in ONLY the longest word, so in this example, you would type in "Drink". Each answer in this quiz will begin with the letter S.

Accidentally pour liquid out - Medicine tablet - Sick
Splash - Large serving plate - Recent
Slant outward - Take part in a game - Put
Plant cell - Small hole in skin - Mining rock
To send out liquid in a fine mist - Speak to God - Beam of light
Spit - Golf club - Speak
Building for keeping horses - Piece of furniture with flat top - Having the ability to do something
No longer fresh - Story - Beer
Put off - High in height - Every one
One of the ossicles in the ear - Records - Gorillas
Beginning - Sour - Paintings, sculptures, etc.
Strict - Type of bird - Another type of bird
questions.explanation:
Stern.

	Stern - Tern - Ern (alternate spelling of erne)

questions.text: Piece of wood - Make a tally mark - Fish disease
Rock - Quality of sound - Single
Stress - Locomotive - Precipitation
Attach - Capture - Knock
Long narrow piece - Journey - Tear
Band of color - Cow's stomach as food - Ready to eat
Leisurely walk - Dwarf - Small loaf of bread or list of names
Drink liquid - Move around in mud - Let
Large group of insects - Heat - Upper limb
Curse - Don - Hearing organ
Change out - Female wizard - Tickling sensation
Food for pigs - Wish - Feverish
Wander - Flat board - Large, flat sea fish
questions.explanation:
Stray.

	Stray - Tray - Ray (like stingray or manta ray)
